_meta.source: Researched from US Forest Service, cruise line guides, and Alaska tourism

bbox_hint.note: Covers Tracy Arm and Endicott Arm fjords - scenic cruising, no docking

transit_routes.name: Fjord Scenic Cruising
transit_routes.note: Ships cruise the 30-mile fjord to reach glaciers. No shore landing. All viewing from ship.

featured_experiences.name: Sawyer Glacier Viewing
featured_experiences.note: Ships position near glaciers for viewing. Watch for ice calving and seals resting on icebergs.

featured_experiences.name: Fjord Cruising
featured_experiences.note: The journey is the experience. Narrow fjord with dramatic scenery entire way.

featured_experiences.name: Wildlife Watching
featured_experiences.note: Bring binoculars. Watch shorelines for bears, cliffs for goats, ice for seals.
